name: Simpson Real Estate Corporation, Appellant, v. Firemen's Insurance Company
name_abbreviation: Simpson Real Estate Corp. v. Firemen's Insurance

judges: Before Jones, O. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
parties: Simpson Real Estate Corporation, Appellant, v. Firemen’s Insurance Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
This is a companion case to Cleland Simpson, Appellant v. Firemen’s Insurance Company, 392 Pa. 67.
Tbe judgment of tbe Court of Common Pleas of Lackawanna County is affirmed on tbe opinion of Judge Hoban, reported in 11 Pa. D. & C. 2d 613.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents in this case for tbe same reasons given in bis dissenting opinion in tbe companion case of Simpson v. Firemen’s Insurance Company, 392 Pa. 67.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: C. H. Welles, 3rd, with him Welles & Macide, for appellant.
Thomas Raeburn White, Jr., with him John W. Bour, Thomas Raeburn White, O’Malley, Morgan, Bour & Gallagher, and White, Williams é Scott, for appel-lees.
casebody.head_matter:

Argued January 14, 1958.
Before Jones, O. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
C. H. Welles, 3rd, with him Welles & Macide, for appellant.
Thomas Raeburn White, Jr., with him John W. Bour, Thomas Raeburn White, O’Malley, Morgan, Bour & Gallagher, and White, Williams é Scott, for appel-lees.
March 26, 1958:
